entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump “China is working very hard. Late last night, I had a very good talk with President Xi and we talked mostly about the coronavirus,” Mr. Trump told reporters at the White House on Friday. “I think they are doing a very professional job.”
